Indonesia's Anies plans to file complaint over election result in top courtIndonesia's presidential candidate Anies Baswedan said on Wednesday he plans to file a complaint at the country's Constitutional Court over last month's election results. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 05:18:45 GMT JNZXGCUZ6RKHNJUNYNFLTXHAKQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/indonesias-anies-plans-file-complaint-over-election-result-top-court-2024-03-13/Reuters世界亚太地区
Putin says Russia will work with any elected US leader, RIA reportsPresident Vladimir Putin said in remarks published on Wednesday that Russia does not interfere in any elections and it will work with any leader the American people elect. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 04:38:38 GMT AL3ETHQNKNMUTD36EXZJJQ4AVY https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-says- Russia-will-work-with-any-elected-us-leader-ria-reports-2024-03-13/Reuters世界欧洲
Putin warns the West: Russia is ready for nuclear warPresident Vladimir Putin warned the West on Wednesday that Russia was technically ready for nuclear war and that if the U.S. sent troops to Ukraine it would be considered a significant escalation of the war. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 03:51:43 GMT DYBBNXXBWNM5HNZALG3RYCSBT4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-says-Russia-ready-nuclear-war-not-everything-rushing-it-2024-03-13/Guy Faulconbridge, Lidia Kelly世界欧洲
Search on for missing Indonesia boat crew after 11 found alive at seaRescue teams searched waters in central Indonesia on Wednesday for 24 fishermen missing since their boat sank at the weekend, with hopes kept alive by the discovery a day ago of 11 survivors who had been floating at sea for three days. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 03:15:08 GMT 37HPOO4WM5O6NBRXOZPCGWJIOA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/search-missing-indonesia-boat-crew-after-11-found-alive-sea-2024-03-13/Reuters世界亚太地区
South Korean held in Russia for spying did humanitarian, mission work, says aid groupA South Korean missionary who has been arrested by Russia on spying charges was sent to do purely humanitarian and mission work and had no involvement in helping North Korean workers in the area to defect, the head of his Christian aid group said. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 03:12:25 GMT Y5DUT6SWWFLDZCJW7VOFKKL55U https://www.reuters.com/world/south-korean-held-Russia-spying-did- humanarian-mission-work-says-aid-group-2024-03-13/Jack Kim世界
Ukraine drones attack Russia for second night in a row, officials sayUkraine launched a sweeping drone attack on several Russian regions for the second night in row, officials said on Wednesday, with more than 30 drones destroyed in the air over the Voronezh region. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 02:46:36 GMT BSEWGJLGAFO3RA6NKOWRKTEK3E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-launches-drone-attacks-Russia-second-night-row-officials-say-2024-03-13/Reuters世界欧洲
China restaurant blast kills one, injures 22A suspected gas leak caused a blast at a restaurant in China's northern province of Hebei that ripped facades from buildings, damaged cars and scattered debris to kill one person and injure 22, state media and authorities said on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 02:42:34 GMT CSLH3BQMAVIVMGJSSN4KQRTVI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/explosion-hebei-china-restaurant-injures-several-people-state-media-reports-2024-03-13/Reuters世界中国
Russian nuclear-powered Losharik submarine to be tested in June or July after repairs, TASS reportsRussia's AS-31 deep-diving nuclear powered submarine, known by its nickname as Losharik, will go out for testing in June or July after completing years of repairs, the state TASS news agency reported on Wednesday, citing an unnamed military source. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 02:24:24 GMT 46KTAL4JKZN5TGFF3IUWCSWIKA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-nuclear-powered-losharik-submarine-be-tested-june-or-july-after-repairs-2024-03-13/Reuters世界欧洲
Japan's Space One 'Kairos' rocket explodes right after lift-offThe small rocket that Japan's Space One launched for its inaugural flight exploded shortly after take-off, live-streaming images showed on Wednesday. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 02:05:59 GMT Z6A65H6LINMW5AKJUBLKLQQLUE https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/japans-space-one-kairos-rocket-explodes-right-after-lift-off-2024-03-13/Reuters技术空间
Sports and music lessons for China's kids in sharp decline as purse strings tightenLast August, Zhang Zhaolin pulled her 10-year-old son out of soccer classes that he loved after she was laid off from her job at a Chinese internet firm. Wed, 13 Mar 2024 01:13:35 GMT VPTL6SMJKRKXZIX7YW2XJF4M6A https://www.reuters.com/world/china/sports-music-lessons-chinas-kids-sharp-decline-purse-strings-tighten-2024-03-13/Sophie Yu, Anne Marie Roantree世界中国
Japan's Space One Kairos rocket explodes on inaugural flightKairos, a small, solid-fuel rocket made by Japan's Space One, exploded shortly after its inaugural launch on Wednesday as the firm tried to become the first Japanese company to put a satellite in orbit. Tue, 12 Mar 2024 23:12:04 GMT SPILJHAGTRIBDGW2A44PMHAUBY https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/japans-space-one-counts-down-inaugural-kairos-rocket-launch-2024-03-12/Kantaro Komiya技术空间
